ygData.subject: Duel Wield (which hand?)
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, I know that you want to keep your best weapon in the primary hand, but how do you apply that rule when one weapon has an effect. I have a silvery war axe
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, I know that you want to keep your best weapon in the primary hand, but how do you apply that rule when
one weapon has an effect. I have a silvery war axe and an Obsidian Shard. Both have damage 6. However,
the shard has a longer delay and an effect and the axe has a shorter delay. Which is better in the
primary? My uderstanding of how the effect works is that if I putt it in the secondary hand, the effect
roll will only happen when the duel wield goes off.

Bob T
